value.name: Officer justified in 2020 shooting of suicidal man in Holladay
value.description: The shooting of a suicidal man in Holladay last summer by a Unified police officer was declared justified by Salt Lake County District Attorney Sim Gill Thursday. “In essence, this was a shooting that did not need to happen.
